description:
This Extra Pack 2 is the perfect content to enhance your experience with a lot of new elements: 

• 4 new powerful characters: Jiren, Fu, Android 17 (DB Super), and Goku (Ultra Instinct)
• Exclusive New Scenario
• 5 New Parallel Quests
• 2 New Costumes
• 8 New Skills
• 8 New Super Souls
name: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 - Extra DLC Pack 2
